mapper.select: select s.suggest_id, j.jobs_id, r.resume_id, c.comp_name, j.title, j.position, s.state, u.name from suggest_tb s join jobs_tb j on s.jobs_id = j.jobs_id join comp_tb c on j.comp_id = c.comp_id join resume_tb r on r.resume_id = s.resume_id join user_tb u on u.user_id = r.user_id where u.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into suggest_tb ( resume_id, jobs_id, state, created_at ) values ( #{sDto.resumeId}, #{sDto.jobsId}, 0, now() )
mapper.update: update suggest_tb set state = #{sDto.state} where suggest_id = #{sDto.suggestId}
